title.bibl: Lietuva, Vol. V, No. 6, Feb. 6, 1897"Money, the Disturbance of Mind."

div.bibl: Lietuva, Vol. V, No. 6, Feb. 6, 1897"MONEY, THE DISTURBANCE OF MIND."

body.p: This will be the third play given by the Simonas Daukantas society on Sunday, February 14, 1897. This play is very interesting; it will be shown how a stingy man wanted to become rich by cheating his friend. That he had nothing on his mind but money and money. How he tried various schemes of cheating to make money, but when he failed, he then became desperate.
This play will be performed at the church hall at 33rd and Auburn avenue. It will start at 6 P. M. Admission 25
After the performance of the play, will be dances. All Lithuanians are invited to come.
